Nightstrike ::

Nightstrike avoided the wave of acid using his trasmetal hawk beast 
mode (this form has an extraordinary agility, allowing him to 
manoeuvre around obstacles quite efficiently) that was a black and 
dark blue hawk with silver beak and claws, which blends into any 
darkness. After he avoided the acyd wave he transformed to Aurora jet 
mode and fired two missiles (his patented Nightstrike missiles, which 
are long-range high explosive missiles with a large blast radius): 
one to Iron Raptor and one to Prowl,  "Stupid reptile" shouted 
Nightstrike "IF WE'RE IN THE BOTTON OF THE FOOD CHAIN, WHY ARE WE 
WINNING THE BATTLE? IF YOU'RE IN THE TOP, WHY ARE YOU DYING IN 
BATTLEFIELD AND IN OUR CELLS?"


WHy he had said "In our cells"? asked himself Nightstrike inside his 
mind... why?

But he continued his insults "Insignificate IDIOT!!! MAximals can't 
defend ANYTHING, neither their patetic lives... "


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Iron Raptor bared her teeth up at Nightstrike, suddenly realizing 
that 
> Prowl had opened his mind up to her just then.
> < Excellent!>
> But soon her mind focused on Nightstrike again, snarling at what he 
said 
> about the Maximals.*
> 
> " YOUR RACE IS IN ITS PLACE, NIGHTSTRIKE!"
> 
> * Suddenly, without warning she transformed into her SBM, the large 
black 
> form of the Nostelgia ( Alien ) rising an incredable 15 ft. Her 
shadow 
> decended upon Nightstrike.*
> 
> " AT THE BOTTOM OF THE FOOD CHAIN!"
> 
> * Her voice boomed before a wave of acid sprayed towards 
Nightstrike.
> Her mind directed Prowl's free thoughts to mingle with hers and 
join in the 
> same form of attack.*
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
